question:
District category contains Legislative District, Learning Hub, and Condo District.
Supermarkets category contains Blue Apron, Metro (Canada), and Bristol Farms.
The number of each Legislative District 's Metro (Canada) equals 17.
The number of each Learning Hub 's Blue Apron equals the sum of each Condo District 's Metro (Canada), each Legislative District 's Blue Apron, and each Condo District 's Bristol Farms.
The number of each Legislative District 's Bristol Farms equals 3 times each Learning Hub 's Metro (Canada).
The number of each Learning Hub 's Bristol Farms equals each Condo District 's Blue Apron.
The number of each Learning Hub 's Metro (Canada) equals each Condo District 's Bristol Farms.
The number of each Condo District 's Bristol Farms equals 17 more than each Legislative District 's Blue Apron.
The number of each Condo District 's Metro (Canada) equals 17.
The number of each Legislative District 's Blue Apron equals 16 times each Condo District 's Metro (Canada).
The number of each Condo District 's Blue Apron equals 7.
How many Blue Apron does Learning Hub have?
solution:
Define each Condo District 's Metro (Canada) as o; So o = 17.
Define each Legislative District 's Blue Apron as B; So B = 16 * o = 16 * 17 = 19.
Define each Condo District 's Bristol Farms as S; So S = 17 + B = 17 + 19 = 13.
Define each Learning Hub 's Blue Apron as p; o = o + B = 13 + 19 = 13; So p = S + o = 13 + 13 = 3.
